workflow.name: Automate cancellation feedback collection with Stripe and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
Who's it for
This template is perfect for any SaaS business or subscription service using Stripe. Product managers, customer success teams, and founders can use this to automatically collect cancellation feedback without manual follow-up. Ideal for companies looking to reduce churn by understanding why customers leave.
What it does
When a customer cancels their Stripe subscription, this workflow instantly:

Detects the cancellation via Stripe webhook
Fetches customer details from Stripe API
Sends a personalized feedback survey email with embedded customer information
Logs all cancellations to Google Sheets for tracking
Receives survey responses via webhook
Automatically routes feedback to different Google Sheets based on reason (pricing concerns, feature requests, or other feedback)

This organized approach helps you identify patterns in cancellations and prioritize improvements that matter most.
How it works

Stripe triggers the workflow when a subscription is canceled
Customer data is fetched from the Stripe API (email, name, plan details)
Personalized email is sent with a survey link containing customer data as URL parameters
Cancellation is logged to a Google Sheets "Cancellations" tab
When the customer submits the survey, a webhook receives the response
Feedback is routed to dedicated sheets based on cancellation reason:

Price Concerns ‚Üí for pricing-related issues
Feature Requests ‚Üí for missing functionality
Other Feedback ‚Üí for everything else



Set up steps
Setup time: ~20 minutes
Prerequisites

Stripe account (test mode recommended for initial setup)
Google account with Google Sheets
Email service (Gmail, Outlook, or SMTP)
Survey tool with webhook support (Tally or Typeform recommended)

Configuration

Stripe webhook: Copy the webhook URL from the "Stripe Subscription Canceled" node and add it to your Stripe Dashboard ‚Üí Webhooks. Select the customer.subscription.deleted event.
Email credentials: Configure Gmail, Outlook, or SMTP credentials in the "Send Feedback Survey Email" node. Update the fromEmail parameter.
Survey form: Create a survey form with these fields:

Hidden fields (auto-populated from URL): email, customer_id, name, plan
Visible fields: reason dropdown ("Too Expensive", "Missing Features", "Other"), comments textarea
Configure webhook to POST responses to the "Survey Response Webhook" URL


Google Sheets: Create a spreadsheet with 4 sheets: "Cancellations", "Price Concerns", "Feature Requests", and "Other Feedback". Connect your Google account in the Google Sheets nodes.
Survey URL: Replace [SURVEY_URL] in the email template with your actual survey form URL.
Test: Use Stripe test mode to trigger a test cancellation and verify the workflow executes correctly.

Requirements

Stripe account with API access
Google Sheets (free)
Email service: Gmail, Outlook, or SMTP server
Survey tool: Tally (free), Typeform (paid), or custom form with webhook capability
n8n instance: Cloud or self-hosted

How to customize

Different surveys by plan: Add an IF node after getting customer details to send different survey links based on subscription tier
Slack notifications: Add a Slack node after "Route by Feedback Type" to alert your team about price concerns in real-time
Delayed email: Insert a Wait node before sending the email to give customers a 24-hour cooldown period
CRM integration: Add nodes to sync cancellation data with your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.)
Follow-up workflow: Create a separate workflow that triggers when feedback is received to send personalized follow-up offers
Custom routing logic: Modify the Switch node conditions to match your specific survey options or add more categories

Tips for success

Use Stripe test mode initially to avoid sending emails to real customers during setup
Customize the email tone to match your brand voice
Keep the survey short (2-3 questions max) for higher response rates
Review feedback weekly to identify patterns and prioritize improvements
Consider offering a discount or incentive for completing the survey

workflow.name: Send feedback survey to canceled Stripe subscriptions

parameters.content:
## üìã Automated Feedback Survey on Stripe Cancellation

**What this workflow does:**

When a customer cancels their Stripe subscription, this workflow automatically:

1. ‚úÖ Detects the cancellation event via Stripe webhook
2. ‚úÖ Fetches customer email and name from Stripe API
3. ‚úÖ Sends a personalized feedback survey email with embedded customer data
4. ‚úÖ Logs cancellation details to Google Sheets
5. ‚úÖ Receives survey responses via webhook
6. ‚úÖ Routes feedback to different sheets based on reason (Price/Features/Other)

**Why it matters:**

Understanding why customers leave is critical for reducing churn. This workflow ensures you never miss collecting valuable cancellation feedback and organizes it automatically for actionable insights.

**Setup time:** ~20 minutes

**Compatible survey tools:** Tally, Typeform, or any tool with webhook support

---

## üîß Setup Steps

### 1. Connect Your Stripe Account
- Use test mode for initial setup
- Copy the webhook URL from the "Stripe Subscription Canceled" node
- Add it to your Stripe Dashboard ‚Üí Webhooks
- Select event: `customer.subscription.deleted`

### 2. Configure Email Credentials
- Set up Gmail, Outlook, or SMTP credentials
- Update the "from" email address in the send email node

### 3. Create Your Survey Form
Your survey form needs these fields:
- **Hidden fields** (populated from URL parameters):
  - email
  - customer_id
  - name
  - plan
- **Visible fields:**
  - Reason dropdown ("Too Expensive", "Missing Features", "Other")
  - Comments textarea

### 4. Configure Survey Webhook
- Get the webhook URL from the "Survey Response Webhook" node
- Configure your survey tool to POST responses to this URL
- Ensure the payload includes: email, customer_id, name, plan, reason, comments

### 5. Set Up Google Sheets
Create a Google Sheets document with 4 sheets:
- **Cancellations** (main log of all cancellations)
- **Price Concerns** (for price-related feedback)
- **Feature Requests** (for feature-related feedback)
- **Other Feedback** (for everything else)

### 6. Update Survey URL
Replace `[SURVEY_URL]` in the email template with your actual survey link

---

## üí° Customization Ideas

- Add **Slack notification** for real-time alerts on price concerns
- Use **IF node** to send different surveys based on subscription tier
- Add **Wait node** to delay email by 24 hours
- Add **urgent flag** for high-value customer cancellations
- Integrate with your CRM for follow-up workflows

---

## üìä What Gets Logged

**Cancellations sheet:**
- Cancellation timestamp
- Customer ID, email, name
- Plan name
- Email send status

**Feedback sheets (organized by reason):**
- Response timestamp
- Customer details
- Cancellation reason
- Additional comments

---

## üéØ Benefits

- **Reduce churn** by understanding why customers leave
- **Prioritize** product improvements based on organized feedback
- **Automate** the entire feedback collection process
- **Track** which plans have the highest cancellation rates

## Step 1: Detect Cancellation

Listens for `customer.subscription.deleted` webhook event from Stripe.

**Setup:**
- Connect your Stripe account
- Copy the webhook URL from this node
- Add it to Stripe Dashboard ‚Üí Webhooks
- Select event: customer.subscription.deleted

## Step 2: Get Customer Info

Fetches customer email and name from Stripe API.

**Why needed:**
The webhook event doesn't include email directly - we must fetch it separately for the survey email and URL parameters.

## Step 3: Send Survey Email

**IMPORTANT: Survey URL Setup**

The survey URL includes customer data as parameters:
`[SURVEY_URL]?email={email}&customer_id={id}&name={name}&plan={plan}`

**Required setup:**
1. Enter your **From Email** address
2. Configure email credentials (Gmail/Outlook/SMTP)
3. Replace `[SURVEY_URL]` with your actual survey link
4. Configure your survey form to:
   - Accept URL parameters (email, customer_id, name, plan)
   - Store them as hidden fields
   - Send data to webhook when submitted

**Supported survey tools:**
- Tally (has webhook)
- Typeform (has webhook)
- Custom form with webhook

## Step 4: Log Cancellation

**Setup:**
- Select your Google Sheets document
- Sheet name: "Cancellations"
- Headers created automatically on first run

**Columns logged:**
- Cancellation timestamp
- Customer ID, email, name
- Plan name
- Email send status

This logs every cancellation regardless of survey response.

## Step 5: Receive Survey Response

**SEPARATE WORKFLOW TRIGGER**

This webhook activates when a customer submits the survey.

**Survey form webhook setup:**
- Configure webhook to POST to this URL
- Include these fields in webhook payload:
  - email
  - customer_id
  - name
  - plan
  - reason ("Too Expensive", "Missing Features", "Other")
  - comments

**Test webhook:**
Use the "Listen for Test Event" feature to test with sample data

## Step 6: Route by Reason

Sorts feedback into 3 categories based on the "reason" field:

**Output 0:** reason contains "expensive" or "price" or "cost"
‚Üí Goes to "Price Concerns" sheet

**Output 1:** reason contains "feature" or "functionality" or "missing"
‚Üí Goes to "Feature Requests" sheet

**Output 2:** Everything else
‚Üí Goes to "Other Feedback" sheet

**Customize:**
Edit the Switch node conditions to match your survey options

## Step 7: Log to Category Sheets

**Create 3 sheets in your Google Sheets:**

1. **Price Concerns** - for pricing issues
2. **Feature Requests** - for missing features
3. **Other Feedback** - for everything else

**Each logs:**
- Response timestamp
- Customer email, name
- Plan name
- Cancellation reason
- Additional comments

This organization helps you:
- Prioritize pricing adjustments
- Plan product roadmap
- Understand other churn factors

parameters.html:
=

Hi {{ $json.name || "there" }},

Thank you for being a customer. We're sorry to see you go.

To help us improve our service, would you mind sharing why you decided to cancel? It only takes 1 minute:

Share Your Feedback

You were subscribed to: {{ $('Stripe Subscription Canceled').item.json.data.object.items.data[0].plan.nickname || 'Your Plan' }}

Your feedback means the world to us and will help us serve our customers better.

Thank you,
[Your Company Name]

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.
parameters.subject: We're sorry to see you go ‚Äî Quick 1-min survey
